REMOTE, INTERN - "DevOps apprentice"

We're a small boutique consultancy based in Munich, Germany and are looking for someone enthusiastic about (learning and executing) DevOps.

You would be implementing projects ranging from smaller puppet scenarios, database replication scenarios to high availability web services, continuous deployment and more.

We're primarily looking for someone who has a hunger to learn, read (think Safari Online) and is as crazy about tech as we are ourselves. Training and guidance will be provided and we'd love to build a long-lasting relationship.

If you're interested, shoot a mail to jobs@marcobehler.com for further information.
